summary: This is an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting that subpoena returns from Delta Airlines and AT&T be added to a shared location and a spreadsheet updated. It indicates ongoing investigative activity related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email requesting that subpoena returns from Delta Airlines and AT&T be added to a shared location and a spreadsheet updated.

events.title: Email Request for Subpoena Returns
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney emails a request to add subpoena returns from Delta Airlines and AT&T to a shared location and update a spreadsheet.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: The document is an email dated June 18, 2020, from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email references subpoena returns from Delta Airlines and AT&T, indicating the use of legal process to obtain records from these companies.
The request to 'update the spreadsheet' suggests an organized, ongoing effort to compile and track information obtained via subpoena.
